Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 12 Sekkhattika » 12.3 Paccayavāra » 12.3.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 12.3.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Sekkhattika
Paccayavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
30.
1746Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane sattarasa, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1747Paccanīyaṃ.
